Assessment.QuestionText: You want to check whether the user has clicked the Yes button of the message box. Which one of the following codes will help you achieve this?

Options.Option:
if (MessageBox.ShowDialog("Do you want to close the application ?", "Message Box", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo) == DialogResult.Yes)
{
      Application.Exit();
}
else
{
   this.Hide();
}

if (MessageBox.Show("Do you want to close the application ?", "Message Box", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo) = "Yes")
{
      Application.Exit();
}
else
{
   this.Hide();
}

if (MessageBox.Show("Do you want to close the application ?", "Message Box", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo) == Yes)
{
      Application.Exit();
}
else
{
   this.Hide();
}

if (MessageBox.Show("Do you want to close the application ?", "Message Box", MessageBoxButtons.YesNo) == DialogResult.Yes)
{
   Application.Exit();
}
else
{
   this.Hide();
}

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (D).
